sub_title: Producten- en Dienstenmanager bij Politie Nederland
summary:
Energetic and strategic-minded professional with a demonstrated history of working in international environment. This energy comes from meeting new people, travelling to new places, and learning more and more of the world and society we live in. 

Experience, knowledge, and skills are key to write and evaluate high-quality offers and proposals on both strategic and commercial level which help me to be one step ahead of others. My ability to acquire and use new knowledge enables me to be a strong and reliable partner for discussion and collaboration. Additionally, my perseverance, opportunism and market analysis form the foundation of delivering results in a competitive and complex world. 

The energy boost comes with the final success: a satisfied partner, colleague, supplier, or customer.

Oh and knowledge is key.

projects.title: NWO/Wotro Project: Inclusive Business Models in Sub-Saharan Africa.
projects.description: Dutch firms increasingly look for more 'inclusive' business models and enter into Public Private Partnerships in order to contribute to inclusive economic growth in the African countries where they invest. Through the study of Dutch frontrunner companies in five East-African countries, this research investigates the critical success factors of such partnerships and their potential to contribute to sustainable development.

projects.title: Exercise Reliable Sword - Comprehensive Approach
projects.description:
Modern-day military operations are faced with complex situations that involve not only security but also many political and development issues. In order for the military to adapt to this new environment, it is crucial that relationships are build up with civilian partner organisations as well as national and local authorities, both prior to deployment and in the field. Central to exercise Reliable Sword of the 1 (German/Netherlands) Corps was therefore the Comprehensive Approach, emphasising the cooperation between the various stakeholders during a military mission.

Exercise Reliable Sword was conducted in the Harskamp, Nieuw Milligen and in the area south of Arnhem in the Netherlands between 6 and 23 May. Around 4,000 troops participated in this Command Post Exercise (CPX) and Field Training Exercise (FTX). The aim of the exercise was to train the units of the NATO Response Force (NRF) 2015 and other participating units under the command of Headquarters 1 (GE/NL) Corps in a role as a Joint Task Force Headquarters Land (JTF HQ (L)).

Participants from 12 nations, including units from Germany, the Czech Republic, the United States, the Netherlands and a Maritime Command Component were trained in planning, commanding and executing of (air mobile) operations. During Reliable Sword, the Dutch 11 Air Manoeuvre Brigade was certified as an Immediate Response Force for NRF 2015.

Producten- en Dienstenmanager bij Politie Nederland

profile_positions.description:
Als PDM’er ben ik binnen Dienst Verwerving verantwoordelijk voor het toegewezen inkooppakket binnen Politie Uitrusting en daarvoor organisatie-breed het aanspreekpunt.  

De volgende rollen en werkzaamheden behoren tot de kern van mijn functie:
-	Het regisseren van de levenscyclus van de onder het inkooppakket vallende producten, diensten en werken.
-	Het voorbereiden, organiseren, regisseren en realiseren van complexe Europese aanbestedingsprojecten. Dit omvat o.a. het opstellen van plannen van aanpak, het doen van onderzoek naar en het opstellen van de businesscase, het specificeren van de behoefte en het opstellen van het programma van eisen, het voeren van regie inzake de totstandkoming van beleid inzake het bestellen, gebruik, bewaken en beheren van ingekochte producten, diensten en werken, het in werking brengen en uitfaseren van contracten.
-	Het rapporteren over de voortgang, de issues en de risico’s van het project en doet voorstellen over hoe deze op te lossen. 
-	Het voeren van een spanningsvolle dialogen met opdrachtgevers, gebruikers, afnemers en materiedeskundigen enerzijds en met de inkopers van de dienst Verwerving anderzijds t.b.v. de doelmatigheid van de in te kopen producten. 
-	Het monitoren van de met de leverancier afgesproken dienstverlening en het in dat kader uit te voeren leveranciersmanagement. 
-	Het zijn van een kennishouder van de relevante markt en producten en het bouwen en onderhouden van relevante netwerken binnen en buiten de politieorganisatie door o.a. het deelnemen aan of bezoeken van relevante fabrikanten, congressen, workshops, opleidingen, trainingen, cursussen en seminars.
profile_positions.title: Producten- en Dienstenmanager Politie Uitrusting
Account Manager US

profile_positions.description:
At the MEG we trade and provide pharmaceuticals, medical and lab equipment and furniture and medical kits throughout the world, most often in developing counties in Africa and South-America. Our focus is on developing country-specific healthcare issues and situations demanding immediate action, dedication and determination. 

I am employed at the International Sales department where I am adding value by bridging the gap between the US-based customers, international suppliers and end-users in the developing world.  As daily vocal point for a range of key-customers, I am able to optimize the service and that is why I can respond quickly and fully to regular or individual queries and tenders. Being responsible for development of new initiatives and opportunities in the pharmaceutical and medical field requires to work closely together with colleagues at our office. This means that I am active on both the operational level as well as strategically. My portfolio consists of the following customers and specific projects, which resulted in an in-depth focus on (anti-malarial) pharmaceuticals and VMMC kits.
profile_positions.title: International Sales Executive
Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
As project coordinator I was responsible for the events and inbound trade missions of the NABC. Specific responsibilities include amongst others:

-	The execution and the organization (and possible improvement) of NABC’s events for 2013
-	The responsibility for the high-level content of the events
o	This includes the arrangement of key-note speakers and determining relevant topics within the field of business in Africa 
-	The responsibility for the communication of NABC’s events abroad
-	The shared responsibility for NABC’s internal marketing related issues
-	The execution of support to marketing, sales and organizing trading missions.
